entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
